*,
*:after,
*:before {
  -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
  -webkit-backface-visibility: hidden;
  box-sizing: inherit;
  /* Makes sure all elements have some kind of font size.
  /* Since inside showcase-wrapper I make font-size 0. */
  font-size: 1.6rem;
  line-height: 2.2rem;
}
html {
  position: fixed;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  top: 0;
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
  overflow: hidden;
}
body {
  overflow: hidden;
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
  background-color: #fefefe;
}
#emberForm {
  min-width: 100vw;
  min-height: 100vh;
  overflow-x: hidden;
}
#showcase {
  position: relative;
  height: 100vh;
  overflow-y: auto;
  overflow-x: hidden;
  -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch;
  background-color: #522981;
}
@media (max-width: 1000px) {
  html {
    -webkit-overflow-scrolling: auto;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    font-size: 70%;
  }
  html.mobile-no-scroll {
    overflow-y: hidden;
  }
  html.mobile-no-scroll body {
    overflow-y: hidden;
  }
}
/* Typography Variables */
html {
  font-size: 62.5%;
}
/* Vertical Rhythm */
h1,
h2,
h3,
h4,
h5,
h6,
hgroup,
ul,
ol,
dd,
p,
figure,
pre,
table,
fieldset,
hr {
  margin-top: 0;
  margin-bottom: 2.4rem;
}
.showcase-header {
  text-align: center;
  color: #fff;
  margin-bottom: 2.4rem;
}
h4.showcase-header {
  margin-bottom: 1.2rem;
}
body {
  font-size: 1.6rem;
  line-height: 2.2rem;
  font-weight: 300;
  font-family: "Lato";
}
h1 {
  font-size: 4.8rem;
  line-height: 5.4rem;
  font-weight: bold;
  font-family: "Raleway";
}
h2 {
  font-size: 3.6rem;
  line-height: 4.5rem;
  font-weight: bold;
  font-family: "Raleway";
}
h3 {
  font-size: 2.8rem;
  line-height: 3.5rem;
  font-weight: 300;
  font-family: "Raleway";
}
h4 {
  font-size: 1.8rem;
  line-height: 2.2rem;
  font-weight: 300;
  font-family: "Raleway";
}
blockquote {
  font-size: 2.4rem;
  line-height: 3.5rem;
  font-weight: 300;
  font-family: "Raleway";
}
/* Tablets */
@media (max-width: 961px) and (min-width: 481px) {
  html {
    font-size: 57.5%;
  }
}
/* Tablets */
@media (max-width: 480px) {
  html {
    font-size: 52.5%;
  }
}
.showcase-grid {
  list-style: none;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0 0 2.4rem 0;
  font-size: 0;
}
.showcase-grid__item {
  display: inline-block;
  vertical-align: top;
  width: 100%;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  font-size: 1.6rem;
  letter-spacing: normal;
  word-spacing: normal;
  white-space: none;
}
.showcase-grid--rev {
  direction: rtl;
  text-align: left;
}
.showcase-grid--rev > .showcase-grid__item {
  direction: ltr;
  text-align: left;
}
.showcase-grid--full {
  margin-left: 0;
}
.showcase-grid--full > .showcase-grid__item {
  padding-left: 0;
}
.showcase-grid--right {
  text-align: right;
}
.showcase-grid--right > .showcase-grid__item {
  text-align: left;
}
.showcase-grid--center {
  text-align: center;
}
.showcase-grid--center > .showcase-grid__item {
  text-align: left;
}
.showcase-grid--middle > .showcase-grid__item {
  vertical-align: middle;
}
.showcase-grid--bottom > .showcase-grid__item {
  vertical-align: bottom;
}
.showcase-grid--narrow {
  margin-left: -12px;
}
.showcase-grid--narrow > .showcase-grid__item {
  padding-left: 12px;
}
.showcase-grid--wide {
  margin-left: -48px;
}
.showcase-grid--wide > .showcase-grid__item {
  padding-left: 48px;
}
